languages.text: "Значит, я — пастырь, ведущий людей за идеей, которую они даже не в силах осмыслить".

traits.locale_text: "Значит, я — пастырь, ведущий людей за идеей, которую они даже не в силах осмыслить".

languages.text: "Then that makes me a driver of the ignorant, one who guides people into following an idea they may never hope to comprehend."
languages.original_text: "Значит, я — пастырь, ведущий людей за идеей, которую они даже не в силах осмыслить".

traits.locale_text: "Then that makes me a driver of the ignorant, one who guides people to follow an idea that they have no hope of comprehending."
"Then that makes me a driver of the ignorant, one who guides people to follow an idea that they have no hope of comprehending."
"Then that makes me a driver of the ignorant, one who guides people into following an idea they may never hope to comprehend."
"Then that makes me a driver of the ignorant, one who guides people into following an idea they may never hope to comprehend."
"Then that makes me a driver of the ignorant, one who guides people into following an idea they may never hope to comprehend."
"Then that makes me a driver of the ignorant, one who guides people into following an idea they may never hope to comprehend."

languages.text: «Entonces eso me convierte en un faro para los ignorantes, alguien que guía a los demás para seguir una idea que tal vez nunca puedan aspirar a comprender».
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me a driver of the ignorant, one who guides people into following an idea they may never hope to comprehend."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces eso me convierte en un faro para los ignorantes, alguien que guía a los demás para seguir una idea que tal vez nunca puedan aspirar a comprender».

languages.text: 「それなら、私は無知な者たちの導き手だということになる。理解することを望んですらいないような考えへと、人々を導く存在だと」
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me a driver of the ignorant, one who guides people into following an idea they may never hope to comprehend."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、私は無知な者たちの導き手だということになる。理解することを望んですらいないような考えへと、人々を導く存在だと」

languages.text: “也就是说，我是无知之人的驱使者。我引导人们追随我的理念，而那些人可能究其一生都无法理解。”
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me a driver of the ignorant, one who guides people into following an idea they may never hope to comprehend."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，我是无知之人的驱使者。我引导人们追随我的理念，而那些人可能究其一生都无法理解。”

languages.text: "Dann bin ich eine Triebkraft der Ahnungslosen, damit diese einer Idee folgen, die sie niemals zu verstehen hoffen dürfen."
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me a driver of the ignorant, one who guides people into following an idea they may never hope to comprehend."

traits.locale_text: "Dann bin ich eine Triebkraft der Ahnungslosen, damit diese einer Idee folgen, die sie niemals zu verstehen hoffen dürfen."

languages.text: « Alors, cela fait de moi une bergère des ignorants, un guide qui incite les gens à suivre une idée qu'ils ne pourront jamais comprendre. »
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me a driver of the ignorant, one who guides people into following an idea they may never hope to comprehend."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, cela fait de moi une bergère des ignorants, un guide qui incite les gens à suivre une idée qu'ils ne pourront jamais comprendre. »

languages.original_text: "Then that makes me a driver of the ignorant, one who guides people into following an idea they may never hope to comprehend."

languages.text: "O hâlde cahil cühelanın çobanı oluyorum. İnsanlara asla idrak edemeyecekleri bir fikri takip etsinler diye yol gösteriyorum."
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me a driver of the ignorant, one who guides people into following an idea they may never hope to comprehend."
